body: Hey!  Hey! Hey! Be nice everyone. I knew the pandemic had people's nerves frayed but really. Everyone has their opinions about everything. There is no right or wrong here. That being said, did anyone think the excessive cursing was unoriginal and stereotypical.  I've seen and read so much porn that I just don't consider the dialog something that people would say nowadays. Unless this was originally done in the 70's.
pls, uploader. If you want to color even only 1 page, at least color the whole page.
Should've colored it all the way

@jdogzero Lol did you just mention Juicebox Koujou for having good art? His shit is so bland and cookiecutter it looks like some shit you'd see on deviantart from someone who just learned manga art from a "how to draw manga" book.

@jdogzero you are an ungrateful man, this uploader brings new chapters of this artist everyweek with better resolution and quality from the original ones and you say that he's a lazy ass moron? Unvelivable. If you have complains, write them in an more respectful way, because now you Just where an ungrateful rude man

Eifan, thank you for sharing your work/hobby with everyone when it could be Just keep hidden in your personal collection. If your read this I like for you to know that thanks man, andou hiroyuki is one of my favorite hentai since many years, and you bringing this Upgrade in terms of quality is just... in short words. Thank you, I look fordward to see your next works
@jdogzero hey dumb ass, complain if you're out here paying for it to get fully coloured
We all enjoy of stuffs like this for free guys,have a little of respect for artist whoever him be
People complaining about the uploader on a free hentai site, like god damn

hey dumb ass uploader if your not going to color the entire thing then dont bother coloring anything. lazy ass moron. and nudeclear it is not one of the best. the guy crams so much detail into the drawing you cant tell whats what sometimes. want one of the best artists go with fue or junajunajuice. they are good at drawing this person isnt.
Why not just color the whole thing?
WEIRD/BAD ART? MOTHERFUCKER I'LL MEET YOU OUTSIDE BITCH YOU UNAPPRECIATIVE LITTLE TWAT! THIS IS ONE OF THE BEST ARTSTYLE IN HENTAI INDUSTRY!
Ah this is the guy with the weird/bad art.
nigga has an alaskan bull worm as a dick
